item.title: Ronettes - Be My Baby
item.description:
The night
we meet I new
I needed you so
and if I had
The chance
I’d never let you go
So won’t you say
you love me
I’ll make you
so proud of me
We’ll make ’em turn
their deads
Every place
we go so won’t
You please-
be my little baby-
Say you’ll
be my darling–
Be my baby
now– wow—
I’ll make you
happy baby
Just wait and see
for every kiss
You give me
I’ll give you three
Since the day
I say you
I have been
waiting for you
You know I agore–
you ’til enternity
So won’t you please-
be my little baby-
Say you’ll be
my darling–
Be my baby
now– wow—

Be my little baby-
say you’ll
Be my darling
be my baby now–
Right now ooh–
wow—
Be my little baby-
say you’ll
Be my darling–
be my baby now–
Wow—-
be my little baby-
Say you’ll
be my darling–
Be my baby now–
wow—
Wow—
wow- wow—
